text: Baa rohakana ba reng: “Allah ke Messiah mora oa Maria.” Hobane Messiahoitse:“Oholonabanaba Israelekhumamelang Allah, Mong`a ka le Mong`a lona.” Ruri! Mong le mong ea kopanyang Allah le batlatsetsi, Allah U tla mo hanela ho kena Paradeising. Lehae la hae etlaba mollo kahosafeleng. Hobane sebakeng sa baetsa-libe ho ke ke haeba le bathusi
